comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
Probably same occasion as the previous photo.
Famous Door became Spotlite Club in November 1944.
(“Night Club Reviews: Spotlite Club, New York,” Billboard, December 2, 1944, 26, 33).
It became Famous Door once more from December mid, 1946.
(“Four Spots Left, Jazz Blows Final Breath on 52ns Street,” Down Beat January 15, 1947, 3).
it switched to striptease in November 1947.
(“The Swing on Swing Street Is From Be-Bop to Be-Pretty,” Billboard, November 15, 1947; 37).
